item.title: LaTeX Resume
item.description: I recently updated my resume. A few versions of my old CV and plain old resume were floating around in various cloud storage products, but thought it was time to try something new (although, it’s really not new at all). \newcommand{\resumeSubheading}[4]{ \vspace{-1pt}\item \begin{tabular*}{0.97\textwidth}{l@{\extracolsep{\fill}}r} \textbf{#1} & #2 \\ \textit{\small#3} & \textit{\small #4} \\ \end{tabular*}\vspace{-5pt} } Above snipped was taken from https://github.com/sb2nov/resume - I chose this one. There are so many resume templates in LaTeX that I had trouble choosing which best suited me - just search “latex resume” in github.

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
This is my first post!

This is my github pages site. Built using Hugo, and that’s kinda nifty.
